alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:13PM EDT until July 21 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF CHARLESTON...BERKELEY AND DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 1113 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cape Island to near Sangaree, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of Charleston, Berkeley and Dorchester Counties, including the following locations... Charleston Southern University, Tibwin, Cordesville, Middleton Place, Poppenheim Crossing, South Windermere, Saint Andrews, Dunes West, Groomville, and Wild Dunes. This warning includes the following interstates: I-26 between mile markers 198 and 221. I-526 between mile markers 11 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
